text: Setting default quote template: we have created a custom quote template. How can I set this as default so that sales reps dont have to select it every time? Thanks!
Can you have them setup that legal content as a blog? You can then query a specific blog id- assuming content and layout will be similar.
Is HubSpot available as a Microsoft Power Automate connector? Itâ€™s <https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/connector-reference/|conspicuously absent from this list>.

Hey Dan, we do not have a connector for Microsoft Power Automate at this time. Would you be able to :upvote:  this idea here and add a use case to the comments: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Microsoft-Power-Automate-Flow-Connector/idi-p/395687>

Hi <@UCGBUH5TM>! We are hoping to have the color picker updates out this month so that the majority of color pickers will pull directly from brand defaults. We will send out an update when they are released. Thanks for your patience here!
